PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-07282019-06-03,  ,  ISED,  ,  , 
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectStatistical Survey Operations (Field Interviewers) Collective Agreement
PrecisOrder Authorizing Statistical Survey Operations (SSO) to enter into a collective agreement with the Public Service Alliance of Canada for all employees in the SSO, Interviewers and Senior Interviewers engaged in the carrying out of survey activities primarily outside Statistics Canada Regional Offices group, for the period beginning on December 1, 2014 and ending on November 30, 2018.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
